The crime drama centers around an LAPD officer, who learns about the murder of a Department of Homeland Security officer in broad daylight. He joins a secret task force to find the culprit. However, […] The post Countdown Episode 5 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Shazmeen Navrange
excerpt: Are you eager to learn the release date and time for Countdown Episode 5? Then, here's all you need to know.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Countdown Episode 5 release date and time is not too far away, and many want to know the streaming details. The crime drama centers around an LAPD officer, who learns about the murder of a Department of Homeland Security officer in broad daylight. He joins a secret task force to find the culprit. However, as they investigate the case, they realize that a bigger conspiracy is at play. In the previous episode, the team tried to locate Timur Novikov’s uncle, Mikhail. Then, they come up with a clever plan to draw Volchek out. The upcoming episode, titled “Blurred Edges,” features the team heading to the Belarusian consulate to seek files related to Volchek. It will uncover more details about his identity and what lengths he will go to obtain what he wants. Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Countdown Episode 5 release date & time? The episode’s release date is July 9, 2025, and its release time is 12 a.m. PT and 3 a.m. ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJuly 9, 20253 a.m.Pacific TimeJuly 9, 202512 a.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Countdown right here. Where to watch Countdown Episode 5 You can watch Countdown Episode 5 via Prime Video. Prime Video is Amazon’s over-the-top streaming service that offers a vast library of blockbuster movies and hit shows, which are available to watch anytime and anywhere. The good news is that new users can make use of the service’s 30-day free trial. What is Countdown about? The official synopsis for Countdown is as follows: “When an officer with the Department of Homeland Security is murdered in broad daylight, LAPD detective Mark Meachum is recruited to a secret task force, alongside undercover agents from all branches of law enforcement, to investigate. But the hunt for the killer soon uncovers a plot far more sinister than anyone could have imagined, kicking off a race against time to save a city of millions.”
html:
The Countdown Episode 5 release date and time is not too far away, and many want to know the streaming details. The crime drama centers around an LAPD officer, who learns about the murder of a Department of Homeland Security officer in broad daylight. He joins a secret task force to find the culprit. However, as they investigate the case, they realize that a bigger conspiracy is at play.

In the previous episode, the team tried to locate Timur Novikov’s uncle, Mikhail. Then, they come up with a clever plan to draw Volchek out. The upcoming episode, titled “Blurred Edges,” features the team heading to the Belarusian consulate to seek files related to Volchek. It will uncover more details about his identity and what lengths he will go to obtain what he wants.

Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Countdown Episode 5 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is July 9, 2025, and its release time is 12 a.m. PT and 3 a.m. ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Countdown right here.

Where to watch Countdown Episode 5

You can watch Countdown Episode 5 via Prime Video.

Prime Video is Amazon’s over-the-top streaming service that offers a vast library of blockbuster movies and hit shows, which are available to watch anytime and anywhere. The good news is that new users can make use of the service’s 30-day free trial.

What is Countdown about?

The official synopsis for Countdown is as follows:

“When an officer with the Department of Homeland Security is murdered in broad daylight, LAPD detective Mark Meachum is recruited to a secret task force, alongside undercover agents from all branches of law enforcement, to investigate. But the hunt for the killer soon uncovers a plot far more sinister than anyone could have imagined, kicking off a race against time to save a city of millions.”
